channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: An Industry Perspective On 'Forever Chemicals'
item.description: The global market is rapidly shifting toward products that do not contain PFAS.

item.title: How Remote Patient Monitoring Apps Change Patient-Provider Relations
item.description: Remote patient monitoring (RPM) apps provide a realistic, practical, patient-centered option for the management of chronic diseases.
